protocol.name: P-G19109-1
protocol.text: The seedlings were grown in a growth chamber with a short day (8h light) illumination at 20C.

protocol.name: P-G19109-2
protocol.text: The leaves of wild type and mutant plants were or were not infiltrated with a Pst suspension at the concentration of 10-5 cfu ml-1.

protocol.name: P-G19109-3
text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6-10 ug total RNA. For the detailed protocol, please check the website

protocol.name: P-G19109-4
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100.

protocol.name: P-G19109-5
protocol.text: Phenol/chloroform extraction and LiCl purification of total RNA were performed.
